document_data.name: Company of the Red Raven
document_data.mainbody:
{{otheruses4|the doomed adventuring group|the more successful mercenary company|Red Ravens}}
The '''Company of the Red Raven''' were a [[Cormyr]]ean [[adventurer|adventuring]] company that operated in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]]. On 12 [[Ches]] of the {{YearlinkName|1355}}, they were burned to death by the Great Red Wyrm [[Uryiax]]. Their service was commemorated by a memorial plaque in the office of Registrant General Lord [[Partic Thistle]] in the [[Royal Court]] of [[Suzail]].
